entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `type` TEXT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`entry_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `parent_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `values` TEXT NOT NULL, `timestamp` TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`parent_id`) REFERENCES `measurement`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_measurement_entry_entry_id_parent_id_timestamp_timestamp
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_measurement_entry_entry_id_parent_id_timestamp_timestamp` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`entry_id` ASC, `parent_id` ASC, `timestamp` DESC, `timestamp` ASC)

indices.name: index_measurement_entry_entry_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_measurement_entry_entry_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`entry_id`)

indices.name: index_measurement_entry_parent_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_measurement_entry_parent_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`parent_id`)

indices.name: index_measurement_entry_timestamp
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_measurement_entry_timestamp` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`timestamp`)

views.createSql: CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT measurement.*, latest_entry.* FROM measurement LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM measurement_entry AS entry WHERE entry.timestamp IN(SELECT MAX(E.timestamp) FROM measurement_entry AS E GROUP BY E.parent_id) ORDER BY entry.entry_id DESC) AS latest_entry ON measurement.id = latest_entry.parent_id

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
INSERT OR REPLACE INTO room_master_table (id,identity_hash) VALUES(42, '01ecd4fcfcc747f7c4c89214fbd29e47')
